name: GetTrelloMemberDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a Trello member by ID.

Use this tool to get comprehensive information about a specific Trello member by providing their ID. It’s ideal for obtaining member profile data and understanding user-specific information in Trello.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member

parameters.name: include_actions_details
parameters.description: Include detailed actions information associated with the member. Refer to the Actions Nested Resource for more options.

value_schema.description: See the [Actions Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#actions-nested-resource)

parameters.name: include_boards_details
parameters.description: Include details of boards associated with the member. See the Boards Nested Resource for additional options.

value_schema.description: See the [Boards Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#boards-nested-resource)

parameters.name: board_background_options
parameters.description: Specifies which board backgrounds to retrieve. Options include: 'all', 'custom', 'default', 'none', 'premium'.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `custom`, `default`, `none`, `premium`

parameters.name: boards_invited_filter
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list (closed, members, open, organization, pinned, public, starred, unpinned) to filter invited boards.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of: closed, members, open, organization, pinned, public, starred, unpinned

parameters.name: boards_invited_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields like id, name, desc, etc.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of board [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_card_details
parameters.description: Options to include card-related information about the member. See the Cards Nested Resource for additional options.

value_schema.description: See the [Cards Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#cards-nested-resource) for additional options

parameters.name: include_custom_board_backgrounds
parameters.description: Specify `all` to include all custom board backgrounds or `none` to exclude them.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: include_custom_emoji
parameters.description: Set to 'all' to include all custom emoji details for the member, or 'none' to exclude them.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: include_custom_stickers
parameters.description: Specify 'all' to include all custom stickers or 'none' to exclude them when retrieving member details.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: member_detail_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of member fields to retrieve.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_notifications
parameters.description: Specify whether to include notifications details for the Trello member. Follow the Notifications Nested Resource guidelines.

value_schema.description: See the [Notifications Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#notifications-nested-resource)

parameters.name: organizations_inclusion
parameters.description: Specify if and which organizations related to the member should be returned. One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public`.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public`

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of organization fields (`id`, `name`).

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: invited_organizations_scope
parameters.description: Specify the scope of invited organizations to include in the response. Options: 'all', 'members', 'none', 'public'.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public`

parameters.name: organization_fields_invited
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of invited organization fields or 'all'. Options: 'id', 'name'.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_tokens
parameters.description: Specify if all tokens associated with the member should be returned. Use `"all"` to include tokens, or `"none"` to exclude them.

value_schema.description: `all` or `none`

parameters.name: include_board_stars
parameters.description: Set to true to include board stars in the response.

value_schema.description: Whether to return the boardStars or not

parameters.name: include_paid_account_info_in_workspace
parameters.description: Set to true to include paid account information in the workspace object.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace object

parameters.name: include_paid_account_info
parameters.description: Set to true to include paid account information in the Trello member response.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned member object

parameters.name: include_saved_searches
parameters.description: Set to true to include saved searches data in the response.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.
